conversation.speaker: USER
conversation.text: You know, I've been meaning to check out some classic sci-fi for a while now. Have you seen any good ones from the 80s or 90s?

conversation.text:
Sure, here are some classic sci-fi movies and TV shows from the 80s and 90s:

- Blade Runner (1982)
- Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991)
- Alien (1986)
- The Abyss (1989)
- Predator (1987)
- Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan (1982)
- Dune (1984)
- Stranger Things (1985)

- Blade Wars (1989)
